subject: Order status
description_text:
Good morning, i placed an order on jan 10th and nothing has happened with
it.  Just curious on turn around times a when things would be shipped.

Order #SSN5977
Confirmed Jan 10

*“Don’t ask yourself what the world needs.  Ask yourself what makes you
come alive and then go do that.  Because what the world needs is people who
have come alive.”*  — *Howard Thurman*


David Niles

conversations.body_text: Hi David Niles,  Due to an upcoming product upgrade, this item has been out of stock for two weeks. We will ship the latest version to you as soon as possible after the upgrade is complete, enhancing your experience. We sincerely apologize for the delay and any inconvenience caused.

Do you know when that might be done?  Just trying to plan for things.  My
base and wheel show up tomorrow.  It is what it is at this point. Just
hoping it is not in like 2 months.

*“Don’t ask yourself what the world needs.  Ask yourself what makes you
come alive and then go do that.  Because what the world needs is people who
have come alive.”*  — *Howard Thurman*


David Niles

On Sun, Jan 18, 2026, 9:14 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi David Niles,     ​We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused to you, and we would like to offer our most sincere apology again.​We haven't received notification of the specific time yet, but it's expected to be soon, and we will arrange it for you as quickly as possible.
